info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 12:57PM CDT until June 08 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR PERRY...SOUTHERN CONWAY...WEST CENTRAL FAULKNER...NORTHWESTERN SALINE...EAST CENTRAL YELL AND NORTHWESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Adona, or 10 miles southwest of Perryville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Perryville... Perry... Adona... Houston... Little Italy... Wye Mountain... Williams Junction... Toad Suck... Bigelow... Casa... Aplin... Fourche... Birta... Avilla... Antioch in Perry County... Nimrod... Oak Grove in Perry County... Thornburg... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... Cherry Hill in Perry County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
